Title: Relates to degree-granting programs offered by SUNY's office of higher education in prison
Summary: Creates within SUNY an office of higher education in prison to coordinate access to higher education for individuals during and after incarceration; directs such office to create a plan by 1/1/2029 to establish a degree-granting program in every viable correctional facility in the state; directs such office to enroll at least 2,000 students in degree-granting programs as soon as practicable; makes related provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to degree-granting programs offered by SUNY's office of higher education in prison
